100-at-level-1: Usar PV máximo no primeiro nível/DD
100-at-level-1-title: Usar pontos máximos de vida no primeiro nível. Dados de vida raciais são considerados primeiro se o personagem tem ambos dados de vida raciais e de classe.
ability-attack-dropdowns: Menu de Habilidade e Tipos de Ataque
ability-basis-desc: CD Habilidade base: normalmente CAR para habilidade de Conjuração, CON para veneno, sopro nocivo, ou outras habilidades de dano
ability-damage-desc: Para cada 2 pontos de dano aplicados a uma habilidade, aplicar uma penalidade de –1 para perícias e estatísticas listadas junto à habilidade em questão. Se o dano levado for maior ou igual aos seus pontos de habilidade, você cairá inconsciente de imediato.
ability-drain-desc: Esgotamento de habilidade reduz o escore dela. Modifique todas as perícias e estatísticas relacionadas a esta habilidade. Isso pode fazê--lo perder pontos de perícia, pontos de vida e outros bônus.
ability-notes-place: Put notes about context-sensitive Ability bonuses here
ability-penalty-desc: Penalidades funcionam como dano de habilidade, mas não podem deixá-lo inconsciente ou matá-lo. Penalidades não podem reduzir seus pontos de habilidade para menos que 1.
ability-type-title: Selecione o tipo de habilidade, caso aplicável. ExtOrd(Extraordinário), Mag(Habilidade de Magia), ou SbrNat(Sobrenatural).
acp-may-apply-title: Penalidade para Teste de Armadura pode ser aplicada.
add-note-to-roll-desc: Para adicionar nota textual ao final de uma rolagem, selecione o tipo de rolagem. Use para modificadores dependentes de conteúdo.
add-skill-bonus-macro: Adicionar macro para Bônus de Perícia?
additional-damage-title: Acrescente danos de precisão ou danos críticos extras
additional-modifier-or-macro: Additional modifier or macro, e.g. [[1d6]], [[2d20k1]], etc.
all-attacks-insert-macro-attack: Macro de Inserção de Ataque Global:
all-attacks-insert-macro-cmb: Macro de Inserção de Ataque BMC:
all-attacks-insert-macro-cmb-damage: Macro de Inserção de Dano BMC:
all-attacks-insert-macro-damage: Macro de Inserção de Dano Global:
all-attacks-insert-macro-melee: Macro de Inserção de Ataque Corpo a Corpo:
all-attacks-insert-macro-melee-damage: Macro de Inserção de Dano de Corpo a Corpo:
all-attacks-insert-macro-ranged: Macro de Inserção de Ataque à Distância:
all-attacks-insert-macro-ranged-damage: Macro de Inserção de Dano à Distância:
all-features-desc: Lista de Características contém Habilidades Especiais, Qualidades Especiais, Proezas, etc
all-other-desc: Diversos inclui tudo que não pôde ser encontrado em outras abas
all-saves-macro-title: @{all_saves-macro} | Afeta apenas a rolagem para Todos Registros Salvos do botão do Menu de Defesas.
alternate-ability-cmb-desc: Habilidade alternativa de manobra de combate
alternate-ability-melee-desc: Habilidade alternativa de ataque corpo a corpo
alternate-ability-ranged-desc: Habilidade alternativa de ataque à distância
alternate-favored-class: Contador de pontos de Classe Favorecida alternativa
always-show-domain-spells: Sempre mostrar magias marcadas como "domínio" no menu do livro de magias
apply-font-chatrolls: Aplicar fonte às rolagens do chat
armor-notes-place: Colocar notas sobre bônus de CA sensíveis ao contexto aqui.
armor-shield-bonus: Bônus de Armadura ou Escudo à Classe de Armadura
attack-and-combat-maneuver-bonuses: Ataque e Bônus de Manobra de combate
attack-grid-rows-migrated: Linhas extra da grade de ataque
attack-notes-place: Colocar notas sobre bônus de ataque sensíveis ao contexto aqui.
attacks-dmg-migrated-title: Multiplicador de dano de Ataque Repetitivo migrado. Não pode ser defeito.
attacks-migrated-title: Macros de Ataques Repetitivos migrado. Se a rolagem de um ataque não aparece corretamente, apague o texto da macro e clique em um outro campo. O sistema reiniciará o texto da macro. Repita para macros de ataque iterativas.
base-statistics-place: Se a criatura tem buffs e outros efeitos ativos que modifiquem as suas estatísticas, as estatísticas base devem ser resumidas aqui.
before-combat-place: Lista quaisquer magias e/ou habilidade usadas antes do combate. Suas estatísticas devem refletir estas magias.
bonus-or-penalty: O bônus ou penalidade a ser aplicado
bonus-type-title: Tipo de bônus para agrupamento. Considerar armadura, escudo e armadura natural como bônus (no dropdown de bônus), não "tipo" de bônus de CA.
buff-ability-skill-checks: Bônus para Habilidade & Teste de Perícia e Iniciativa
buff-aid-note: +@{b2_val} bônus de moral em testes de resistência contra efeitos de medo.
buff-air-barrier-note: No nível 13, esta barreira causa às flechas, raios, e outros ataques à distância que requerem rolagem de ataque, uma chance de erro de 50%.
buff-archons-aura-note: dura até que o conjurador seja atingido com um ataque
buff-bane-note: @{b2_val} penalidade em testes de resistência contra efeitos de medo.
buff-battle-ward-note: A próxima vez que um inimigo realizar um ataque contra o alvo, a proteção é ativada e dá um bônus de desvio de @{b1_val} à CA da criatura protegida. A cada ataque seguinte à criatura protegida, o bônus de desvio reduz em 1.
buff-bless-note: +@{b2_val} de bônus moral em testes de resistência contra efeitos de medo.
buff-blessing-of-fervor-note: Escolher bônus de velocidade testando buff 4, ou bônus de Ataque/CA/Reflexo, ou outros bônus por rodada.
buff-charisma-based-skills-penalty-title: Penalidade às perícias baseadas em Carisma
buff-charisma-based-skills-title: Bônus a Perícias baseadas em Carisma
buff-charisma-penalty-title: Penalidade à Carisma. A cada 2 pontos de dano que você leva, aplique uma penalidade de -1 às perícias e estatísticas.
buff-cmd-title: Bônus à defesa de manobras de combate.
buff-combat-expertise-note: Bonus to AC. Penalty to Melee attacks
buff-combat-maneuver-bonus-title: Bônus ao bônus de manobras de combate
buff-consecrate-note: Energia canalizada por CDs aumenta em 3. Duplica isso e todas penalidades caso haja um altar.
buff-constitution-based-skills-penalty-t: Penalidade às perícias baseadas em Constituição
buff-constitution-based-skills-title: Bônus a Perícias baseadas em Constituição
buff-constitution-penalty-title: Penalidade à Constituição. A cada 2 pontos de dano que você receber, aplique uma penalidade de -1 a perícias e estatísticas
buff-curse-note: Você precisa ativar/desativar -6 de qualquer habilidade, ou -4 em Ataques/Testes, ou desmarcar tudo por 50% de chance de agir normalmente.
buff-damage-melee-title: Bônus ao dano corpo a corpo
buff-damage-title: Bônus ao dano de todos os tipos de ataque
buff-deadly-aim-note: Bonus to ranged damage. Penalty to ranged attack
buff-desecrate-note: +3 em testes vs canalização de energia. Duplicar todos bônus caso haja altar.
buff-dexterity-based-skills-penalty-titl: Penalidade às perícias baseadas em Destreza
buff-dexterity-based-skills-title: Bônus a Perícias baseadas em Destreza
buff-dexterity-penalty-title: Penalidade À Destreza. A cada 2 pontos de dano recebidos, aplique uma penalidade de -1 a perícias e estatísticas
buff-elemental-overflow-note: chance de ignorar os efeitos de um golpe crítico ou ataque furtivo
buff-enlarge-person-note: Alcance aumentado, altura x2, peso x4.
buff-haste-note: Ao fazer uma ação de ataque completa, uma criatura rápida pode fazer um ataque extra com uma arma natural ou manufaturada. Todos os modos de movimento aumentam.
buff-inspire-courage-note: +@{b2_val} de bônus de moral em testes de resistência contra efeitos de encanto ou medo.
buff-inspired-rage-note: **Fúria Inspirada**, aliados além do bardo não podem usar nenhuma perícia baseada em Carisma, Destreza ou Inteligência (exceto Acrobacia, Voo, Intimidação, e Montaria) ou qualquer habilidade que requeira paciência ou concentração.
buff-intelligence-based-skills-penalty-t: Penalidade às perícias baseadas em Inteligência
buff-intelligence-based-skills-title: Bônus a perícias baseadas em Inteligência
buff-intelligence-penalty-title: Penalidade à Inteligência. A cada 2 pontos de dano recebidos, aplique uma penalidade de -1 a perícias e estatísticas
buff-kinetic-blast-damage-title: Bônus ao dano de explosão cinética
buff-kinetic-blast-title: Bônus ao ataque de explosão cinética
buff-magearmor-note: feita de força, criaturas incorpóreas não podem ultrapassá-la como fazem com armaduras normais.
buff-melee-title: Bonus to all melee attack rolls.
buff-melee2-title: Bônus às rolagens de ataque 'Alt Corpo a Corpo' apenas
buff-power-attack-damage-title: Bonus to Melee damage. Damage multiplier is handled per Attack.
buff-power-attack-note: Bonus to Melee damage. Penalty to Melee attack
buff-rage-note: Um bárbaro não pode usar nenhuma perícia baseada em Carisma, Destreza ou Inteligência (exceto Acrobacia, Voo, Intimidação, e Montaria) ou qualquer habilidade que requeira paciência ou concentração.
buff-ranged-title: Bonus to all ranged attack rolls.
buff-ranged2-title: Bônus às rolagens de ataque 'Alt à Distância' apenas
buff-shield-note: Nega ataques de mísseis mágicos direcionados a vocês. Este bônus aplica-se contra ataques de toque incorpóreo, pois é um efeito de força.
buff-skill-checks-title: Bonus to all skill and ability checks.
buff-stardust-note: @{b1_val} de penalidade aos testes de visão baseados em Percepção
buff-strength-based-skills-penalty-title: Penalidade às perícias baseadas em Força
buff-strength-based-skills-title: Bônus às perícias baseadas em Força
buff-strength-penalty-title: Penalidade à Força. A cada 2 pontos de dano que você leva, aplique uma penalidade de -1 às perícias e estatísticas.
buff-touch-title: Bonus to touch attack armor class.
buff-type-title: Aba sob a qual esta linha aparecerá. Categorize buffs por conveniência do usuário.
buff-ward-note: Dura até que a criatura protegida seja atingida ou falhe um teste de resistência
buff-wisdom-based-skills-penalty-title: Penalidade às perícias baseadas em Sabedoria
buff-wisdom-based-skills-title: Bônus às perícias baseadas em Sabedoria
buff-wisdom-penalty-title: Penalidade à Sabedoria. A cada 2 pontos de dano que você leva, aplique uma penalidade de -1 às perícias e estatísticas.
buff-wisdom-title: Bônus aos pontos da habilidade de Sabedoria.
buffs-conditions-edit-section: Set and edit buffs and conditions
buffs-migrated-title: Buffs migrados para a seção de Buffs repetidos. Não pode ser desfeito.
buffs-showsect-cmd: Clique para expandir a área de edição de buffs.
carried-currency-title: The amount of currency carried on the character that will contribute to total load
caster-level-basis-explanation: Race/class basis defaults to total character level
character-import-desc:
Hero Lab XML Import

Used to import characters from Hero Lab via XML files
Method #1(preferred)
Step 1: Download and install Leigh M.'s Hero Lab Pathfinder Exporter plug-in for Hero Lab (Use link below. To install you must double-click the .hl file while Hero Lab is NOT running). Note: there have been reports of this plug-in causing the Mac OS X version of Hero Lab to crash when attempting to save using it; if you experience this, you will have to use the second method.
Step 2: From Hero Lab, open the File menu and choose 'Save Custom Output'.
Step 3: Select 'Roll20 Pathfinder' and 'Current Hero Only', then click Output.
Step 4: Open the HTM file in a plain-text editor such as Notepad or Notepad++ and copy the entire contents.
Step 5: Paste the JSON into the text field directly below these instructions
Step 6: Click outside of the textarea to parse. If the import was successful, the textarea will clear with no errors.
Method #2
Step 1: Save the character as an XML file in Hero Lab (File -> Save Custom Output)
Step 2: Open the XML file in a plain-text editor. Copy and paste the contents into www.ConvertJSON.com (XML to JSON converter linked below). Paste into the left window labeled 'Xml Data', click 'Convert XML to JSON' to convert the the XML file to JSON, then copy the text from the right window.
Step 3: Paste the JSON into the text field directly below these instructions
Step 4: Click outside of the textarea to parse. If the import was successful, the textarea will clear with no errors.
charisma-penalized-title: Carisma Penalizada. Penalidades aos pontos de habilidade apenas mudam o modificador, não os pontos em si. A cada 2 pontos de dano ou penalidade a uma habilidade, aplique uma penalidade de –1 às perícias e estatísticas relacionadas.
class skill-bonus|armor-check-penalty|si: Bonus de Perícia por Classe / Penalidade de Armadura / Mod Tamanho / Penalidade por Condições
class-number-explanation: Número da classe: este número é usado em dropdowns ao selecionar uma classe (não pode criar seleção por nome)
combat-effects-migrated-title: Efeitos de ataque e dano migrados para Buffs. Não pode ser desfeito.
combat-maneuver-bonus-notes-place: Put notes about context-sensitive CMB bonuses here.
combat-maneuver-defense-notes-place: Put notes about context-sensitive CMD bonuses here.
combat-maneuver-notes-place: Put notes about context-sensitive CMD bonuses here.
compendium-drag-n-drop-desc: Drag items, spells, etc from the compendium to an empty row below to auto populate the information. Compendium is at the italic i icon above the chat.
concentration-bonus-desc: Bonus to concentration rolls = caster level plus ability score
condition-bleed-title: A creature takes the listed amount of damage at the beginning of its turn. Stopped by DC 15 Heal check or spell that cures hp damage.
condition-blinded-note: –4 de penalidade em testes de Percepção por oponentes. Todos os testes e atividades que dependem de visão (como ler e testes de Percepção baseados em visão) falham automaticamente.
condition-blinded-speed: Blind creatures must make a DC 10 Acrobatics skill check to move faster than half speed.
condition-blinded-title: -2 de penalidade para a Classe de Armadura
condition-cowering-title: -2 de penalidade para a Classe de Armadura
condition-dazed-title: A criatura é incapaz de agir normalmente. Uma criatura atordoada não pode realizar ações, mas não recebe penalidade à CA.
condition-deafened-note: -4 de penalidade em testes de Percepção por oponentes, falha automaticamente em testes de Percepção baseados em som
condition-deafened-spellonly: Has a 20% chance of spell failure when casting spells with verbal components
condition-deafened-title: -4 de penalidade em rolagens de iniciativa, -4 de penalidade nos testes de Percepção propostos, e tem uma chance de 20% de falha de encantamento ao conjurar com componentes verbais
condition-description: Modificadores devido às condições que afetam este bônus
condition-disabled-title: A disabled character may take a single move action or standard action each round (but not both, nor can he take full-round actions, but he can still take swift, immediate, and free actions). He moves at half speed. Performing any standard action (or any other action the GM deems strenuous, including some free actions such as casting a Quicken Spell spell) deals 1 point of damage after the completion of the act.
condition-drowning-title: When the character finally fails her CON check, she begins to drown. In the first round, she falls unconscious (0 hp). In the following round, she drops to –1 hit points and is dying. In the third round, she drowns.
condition-dying-title: Uma criatura que está morrendo não pode realizar ações. No próximo turno do personagem, após ter seus pontos de vida negativados (mas sem morrer), e durante todos os outros turnos, o personagem precisa fazer um teste CD 10 CON para se estabilizar. O personagem recebe uma penalidade nessa rolagem equivalente ao seus pontos de vidas totais negativos. Um personagem que está estável não precisa realizar este teste. Um 20 natural nesse teste é sucesso automático. Se o personagem falha nesse teste, ele perde 1 ponto de vida. Se uma criatura que está morrendo tem uma quantidade negativa de pontos de vida igual aos seus pontos de CON, ela morre.
condition-energy-drained-title: Penalidade de -1 para todas rolagens de ataque, testes de manobras de combate, defesa de manobras de combate, testes de resistência, testes de perícia,  e testes de habilidade. Além disso, há redução de 5 PV tanto para o PV atual quanto para o máximo.
condition-entangled-title: Penalidade de -2 para todas as jogadas de ataque e -4 para a Destreza
condition-exhausted-title: -6 de penalidade à Força e à Destreza
condition-fascinated-title: –4 penalty on skill checks made as reactions, such as Perception checks
condition-fatigued-title: -2 de penalidade à Força e à Destreza
condition-fear-title: Abalado/Assustado/Apavorado: -2 de penalidade para jogadas de ataque, testes de resistência, testes de perícia e testes de habilidade
condition-flat-footed-title: Flat-Footed: perde seu bônus de Destreza para a CA e CMD (se qualquer) e não pode fazer ataques de oportunidade, a não ser que tenha a habilidade Reflexo de Combate ou a habilidade de Classe Esquiva Uncanny
condition-grappled-cmb-note: **+**[[2]] to grapple or escape a grapple.
condition-grappled-invisible-note: If a grappled creature becomes invisible, through a spell or other ability, it gains a +2 circumstance bonus on its CMD to avoid being grappled
condition-grappled-spell-note: A character who attempts to cast a spell or use a spell-like ability must make a concentration check (DC 10 + grappler's CMB + spell level), or lose the spell.
condition-grappled-title: -2 de penalidade em todas as rolagens de ataque e uma penalidade de -4 em Destreza
condition-helpless-note: Melee attacks against a helpless target get a +4 bonus
condition-incorporeal-title: Creatures with the incorporeal condition do not have a physical body. Incorporeal creatures are immune to all nonmagical attack forms. Incorporeal creatures take half damage (50%) from magic weapons, spells, spell-like effects, and supernatural effects. Incorporeal creatures take full damage from other incorporeal creatures and effects, as well as all force effects.
condition-nauseated-title: Nauseated creatures are unable to attack, cast spells, concentrate on spells, or do anything else requiring attention. The only action such a character can take is a single move action per turn.
condition-paralyzed-note: Helpless, but can take purely mental actions
condition-paralyzed-title: Effective Dexterity and Strength scores of 0 and is helpless, but can take purely mental actions
condition-petrified-title: A petrified character has been turned to stone and is considered unconscious.
condition-pinned-spell-note: A pinned creature can take verbal and mental actions, but cannot cast any spells that require a somatic or material component.
condition-pinned-title: Penalidade adicional de -4 à Classe da Armadura
condition-prone-note: +4 de bônus à Classe de Armadura contra ataques à distância, –4 de penalidade à CA contra ataques corpo a corpo
condition-prone-title: -4 de penalidade em rolagens de ataque corpo a corpo
condition-sickened-title: -2 de penalidade nas jogadas de ataque, jogadas de dano, testes de resistência, testes de perícia e testes de habilidade
condition-stable-title: The character is no longer dying, but is still unconscious.
condition-staggered-title: A staggered creature may take a single move action or standard action each round (but not both, nor can he take full-round actions). A staggered creature can still take free, swift, and immediate actions. A creature with nonlethal damage exactly equal to its current hit points gains the staggered condition.
condition-stunned-title: -2 de penalidade à Classe da Armadura
condition-suffocating-title: When the character fails one of these CON checks, she begins to suffocate. In the first round, she falls unconscious (0 hit points). In the following round, she drops to –1 hit points and is dying. In the third round, she suffocates.
condition-unconscious-title: Unconscious creatures are knocked out and helpless. Unconsciousness can result from having negative hit points (but not more than the creature’s CON score), or from nonlethal damage in excess of current hit points.
conditions-showsect-cmd: Click to expand condition edit area.
config-header-image-info: Header images are iconic images that appear in the header of roll templates. All macros on the sheet include {{header_image=image attriubute}}. Each roll template has a specific image attribute that works with the options below. i.e. The Spells roll template would use {{header_image=@{header_image-pf_spell}}} Attack images can be set from within each weapon's "Options" section. Hover over the template names below to learn the specific image attributes. You can substitute images for any roll template by using the URL column below or using the syntax {{header_image=[name](url)}}
config-roll-template-info1: Roll templates use a combination of predetermined HTML, CSS, and macro-text to format the output of macros. Roll templates included in the Pathfinder sheet: pf_spell, pf_attack, pf_defense, pf_generic, and pf_block
config-roll-template-info3: Below is a list of each roll template along with it's defined properties(keys). Keys can only be used once within a macro. A key that is not defined may still be included in the macro and will be displayed on a new row as determined by the roll template. i.e. {{foo=foo}} Property values may consist of text, attributes, in-line rolls, images, hyperlinks, etc., or any combination of such values.
config-roll-template-info4: Cada um tem um @{toggle_accessible_flag} , o que faz a frase a seguir aparecer ou não: {{accessible=true}}. Caso accessible esteja ligado, então um template de rolagem alternativo é usado. Ele não possui divs ou tabelas, apenas labels e spans, o que alguns usuários acham mais fácil de usar. Isso também pode ser acionado globalmente ao marcar "usar templates simples".
config-roll-template-info5: Use this syntax to customize output of rolls in the "macro-text" fields found on the sheet.
config-roll-template-pf_ability:
Ability Roll Template (pf_ability)
Used for all Abilities(Class Features, Feats, Traits, etc) 2 column format except for the "description" property
config-roll-template-pf_attack:
Attack Roll Template (pf_attack)
Used for attacks 2 column format except for the "description" property (note: @{macro_options} is used by the sheet to enable the toggling of notes related to attacks and contains the properties for @{melee_notes}, @{ranged_notes}, @{cmb_notes}, and @{attack_notes})
config-roll-template-pf_block:
Block Text Roll Template (pf_block)
Used for Inventory rolls Key/Property names are not shown in this template Best for long blocks of text
config-roll-template-pf_defense:
Defense Roll Template (pf_defense)
Used for Saving Throws (note: @{macro_options} is used by the sheet to enable the toggling of notes related to defense and contains the properties for @{dr_notes}, @{resistances_notes}, @{immunities_notes}, @{weaknesses_notes}, @{sr_notes}, @{armor_notes}, @{save_notes}, @{cmd_notes}, and @{defense-notes})
config-roll-template-pf_generic:
Generic Roll Template (pf_generic)
Used for Ability checks, Initiative, Spell Failure Check, Skill Checks, Concentration Check, Caster Level Check 2 column format, except for righttext_X(1-10), lefttext_X(1-10), and the description keys
config-roll-template-pf_spell:
Spell Roll Template (pf_spell)
Used for all spell-based sheet rolls Primarily formatted to emulate a typical spell stat-block (note: @{spell_options} is used by the sheet to enable the toggling of spell attributes and contains ALL pf_spell specific properties)
config-update-spell-macros-info1: This is a mapping of old spell ids to new spell ids for use in upgrading macros.
config-update-spell-macros-info2:
Click Modify for each spell level and WARNING: DELETE ALL the old spell lists to eliminate old redundant attributes and possibly speed up your sheet
						Once you delete the below you will not be able to re-migrate the spells
confirm-delete-class-feature: Confirm deletion of all Orig Class Features
confirm-delete-feat: Confirm deletion of all Orig Feats
confirm-delete-item: Confirmar a exclusão de todos os itens
confirm-delete-mythic-ability: Confirm deletion of all Mythic Abilities
confirm-delete-mythic-feat: Confirm deletion of all Mythic Feats
confirm-delete-race-trait: Confirm deletion of all Orig Racial Traits
confirm-delete-spell-like-abilities: Confirm deletion of all Orig Spell-like Abilities
confirm-delete-trait: Confirm deletion of all Orig Traits
constitution-penalized-title: Constituição Penalizada. Penalidades aos pontos de habilidade apenas mudam o modificador, não os pontos em si. A cada 2 pontos de dano ou penalidade a uma habilidade, aplique uma penalidade de –1 às perícias e estatísticas relacionadas.
consumable-charge: Consumable or Item with Charges or Uses
create-attack-entry: Create a new attack based on this weapon
create-spell-attack-entry: Create a new attack based on this spell
create-dual-wield: Create dual wield attack using mainhand weapon and offhand weapon at right
critical-title: -3 de penalidade em rolagens de ataque, testes de resistência, testes de perícia, e testes de habilidade, assim como à CA e ao nível de conjurador
current-hp-title: Player adjustable hit tracking of current hit points remaining.
custom-category-desc: Custom category such as spell school or other user defined
custom-crit-confirmation-bonus: Custom critical confirmation bonus for this attack
custom-url-title: Include a custom header image using the provided URL.
damage-dice-affected-by-size: Damage dice affected by size changes
damage-multiplier-title: Damage ability multiplier: .5, 1.5, 2, etc. Penalties are not multiplied.
damage-resistance-title: Damage Reduction: The amount of damage ignored and the type of weapon that negates the ability. (e.g. 5/silver)
defense-notes-place: Put notes about context-sensitive defense bonuses here.
delete-ability-must-confirm-next-checkbo: WARNING: DELETE ALL Abilities, must confirm action using next checkbox
delete-all-old-rows-are-you-sure: WARNING: DELETE ALL buffs in old list, are you sure?
delete-all-rows-are-you-sure: WARNING: DELETE ALL rows, are you sure?
delete-attack-must-confirm-next-checkbox: WARNING: DELETE ALL Attacks, must confirm action using next checkbox
delete-buff-must-confirm-next-checkbox: WARNING: DELETE ALL Buffs, must confirm action using next checkbox
delete-class-feature: WARNING: DELETE ALL Orig Class Features
delete-class-feature-must-confirm-next-c: WARNING: DELETE ALL Orig Class Features, must confirm action using next checkbox
delete-feat-must-confirm-next-checkbox: WARNING: DELETE ALL Orig Feats, must confirm action using next checkbox
delete-item-must-confirm-next-checkbox: WARNING: DELETE ALL Items, must confirm action using next checkbox
delete-mythic-ability-must-confirm-next-: WARNING: DELETE ALL Mythic Abilities, must confirm action using next checkbox
delete-mythic-feat-must-confirm-next-che: WARNING: DELETE ALL Mythic Feats, must confirm action using next checkbox
delete-old-buff-list: WARNING: DELETE ALL buffs from the OLD list
delete-race-trait: WARNING: DELETE ALL Orig Racial Traits
delete-race-trait-must-confirm-next-chec: WARNING: DELETE ALL Orig Racial Traits, must confirm action using next checkbox
delete-spell-like-abilities: WARNING: DELETE ALL Orig Spell-like Abilities
delete-spell-like-abilities-must-confirm: WARNING: DELETE ALL Orig Spell-like Abilities, must confirm action using next checkbox
delete-spells-must-confirm-next-checkbox: WARNING: DELETE ALL Spells, must confirm action using next checkbox
delete-trait-must-confirm-next-checkbox: WARNING: DELETE ALL Orig Traits, must confirm action using next checkbox
dexterity-penalized-title: Destreza Penalizada. Penalidades aos pontos de habilidade apenas mudam o modificador, não os pontos em si. A cada 2 pontos de dano ou penalidade a uma habilidade, aplique uma penalidade de –1 às perícias e estatísticas relacionadas.
difficulty-class-calculation-desc: 10 + Ability score modifier + DC basis level
difficulty-class-effect-basis-desc: Base for calculation of DC and effects, defaults to one half level / hit dice
disabled-title: Consciente enquanto o PV está abaixo deste valor.
display-advanced-macros-title: Display Advanced fields to add to rolls. These will add to any 1d20 roll. Evaluated at roll-time, so queries may be used. Each requires '0' as default, and [[]] around rolls
display-advanced-options-title: Display extra fields for advanced customization, such as columns marked 'user defined'
display-both-whispers: Show both roll menu buttons for Monsters/NPCs
display-both-whispers-title: Display both sets of menu buttons at top of page: for PC-Whisper and NPC-Whisper
display-macro-text-title: Display macro fields for customizing roll template rolls
display-spells-known: Click this to display spells known column
do-not-touch: Do not use this section unless instructed to by sheet developers
domain-spells-explanation: On hybrid that use a mix of prepared and spontaneous spells, this allows the domain checkbox to be used to indicate spontaneous spells that are always available. Domain can be used for Mysteries, Spirit Magic, etc
dual-wield-instructions:
To setup dual wield, copy and paste the Row ID For Macros of the mainhand weapon and offhand weapon (found in IDs section of each attack row) in the fields below. Set mainhand and offhand penalties, and indicate if character has Improved Dual Wield then press Create at left.
If successful a new attack row appears and the two ID fields below will clear. If unsuccessful or attack IDs cannot be found they will not be cleared.
When penalties change or Imroved Dual Wield is gained, update here and press Update to update all existing dual wield entries.
You can only update Name or the iterative name, anything else will be overwritten. Note: DO NOT TOUCH THE ATTACK DROPDOWN
during-combat-place: Lista todas as táticas de combate aqui, incluindo magias, proezas e itens de uso mágico.
edit-mode-title: Toggle Expanded mode(full editing) or Compact mode(important fields only).
edit-time-custom-num-attributes: Evaluate at edit time custom number attributes
effective-caster-level: Effective Caster/character Level: use for effects, if Sp then for caster level checks and concentration
effective-spell-level: Effective spell level: use for difficulty class and concentration checks
enable-pfs-desc: Sets hit points autocalc, prestige and fame points
enable-skill-check-query-title: Skill Checks will include an option to Roll, Take 10, or Take 20.
encumbered-title: Medium or heavy encumbrance penalties may limit speed and dexterity bonus to AC
encumbrance-above-title: Um personagem pode levantar tanto quanto seu máximo de carga sobre a cabeça dele
encumbrance-drag-push-title: A character can generally push or drag along the ground as much as five times his maximum load
encumbrance-heavy-title: Over the medium load and up to this weight, the character is heavily encumbered. At this weight or greater the character is overloaded (loses any Dexterity bonus to AC and can move only 5 feet per round (as a full-round action)).
encumbrance-light-title: Com este peso ou menor de equipamentos carregados, o personagem não está sobrecarregado
encumbrance-max-title: At this weight or greater the character is immobilized
encumbrance-medium-title: Over the light load and up to this weight, the character is moderately encumbered
encumbrance-multiplier-title: The amount that load values will be multiplied
encumbrance-multiplier-total-title: Total amount that load values will be multiplied.
encumbrance-off-ground-title: A character can lift as much as double his maximum load off the ground, but he or she can only stagger around with it
encumbrance-size-multiplier-title: The amount that load values will be multiplied for size. Number of legs are accounted for.
encumbrance-str-bonus-title: Bonus to Strength score for carrying capacity only
ensure-macros-uptodate: Ensure macros are up to date.
equipped-title: Select which armor and shield are equipped.
error-delete-row: Error! You must delete this row before editing any items in this section.
error-msg1: Error! You must delete this row before editing any items in this section.
expand-multiclass: Expand to reveal more class rows
extra-damage-condition: Extra damage condition when dual wielding: Rake, Rend, etc
extra-damage-or-attack-modifiers: Modificadores de ataque ou dano extra
extra-damage-section: Extra Damage (non critical and critical only)
extraordinary-abilities-desc: Extraordinary abilities are nonmagical. They are, however, not something that just anyone can do or even learn to do without extensive training. Effects or areas that suppress or negate magic have no effect on extraordinary abilities.
footer-info: Created by Samuel Marino w/contributions by Vince, Chris Buchholz, Magik, James W. | Last updated:
footnote-macro-info-title: Types of macro-text fields used on the sheet.
footnote-a: (a) Evaluated at edit time. Must evaluate to number. No queries or rolls. Extended Expressions allowed. Must use ID number to refer to row value. Can refer to (a) expressions or number attributes only.
footnote-b: (b) Evaluated at roll time. May output string or number. Queries and rolls allowed. Must put [[brackets]] around rolls. Can refer to (a),(b),(c) expressions.
footnote-c: (c) Evaluated at roll time. Must evaluate to number. Queries and rolls allowed. [[Brackets]] automatically placed around expression. Can refer to (a) or (c) expressions or number attributes only (or (b) if it evaluates to a number).
footnote-d: (d) The actual roll. Sent to chat. Evaluated at roll time. Can refer to any of above.
frequency-title: Select how often this ability is available.
grazed-title: -1 de penalidade em todas as rolagens de ataque, testes de resistência, testes de perícia, e testes de habilidade, assim como à CA e ao nível de conjurador
group-by-school-desc: Group spells by school in spells menu
group-name: Group by name for attackbook buttons
hd-not-bab: Usar DV para DMC ao invés de BBA
hd-not-bab-title: If checked use total HD not BAB for CMD
head: Cabeça
header-image-default: Include the default header image on roll templates.(NOTE: setting can be overridden by Simple roll templates which do not display header images.)
header-image-none: Do not include a header image.
hit-dice-desc: Number of Hit Dice to roll
hit-die-desc: Number of Sides of Hit Die
hit-points-ability-title: Os Pontos de Habilidade que contribuem com bônus/penalidade aos pontos de vida gerais do personagem por nível.
hit-points-adjustment-title: Player configurable adjustment to maximum hit points by way of a formula.
hit-points-class-title: Pontos de Vida devido à classe somente
hit-points-due-to-hit-dice-title: Hit points due to class levels and hit dice
hit-points-modifier-2-title: O valor produzido pela fórmula de PV adj2.
hit-points-modifier-title: The modifier that comes from the Ability Score chosen to adjust hit points per level.
immunities-title: Takes no damage from listed sources. (e.g. acid, fire, paralysis)
improved-title: Improved Dual Wield: check here if offhand attack gains iteratives
in-special-abilities-section: In list under Special Abilities below
include-attack-notes: Include notes or images in attack rolls? Notes and image will be mapped to attack type.
include-information-title: Include these additional attributes with saving throws?
include-spell-info: Include these attributes with each spell roll?
init-speed-full-macro: Init and Speed Info Full Macro:
instru-a-0: New sheets begin on the Configuration page. Use the Settings button(config-show) to edit the sheet.
instru-a-1: Checkboxes with a label cause the section with same name (h2 or h3 header) to be revealed or hidden.
instru-a-2: Screenreader users please turn on reading of Title attributes. A lot of information is still in the titles.
instru-a-3: Screenreader users should check expand all to ensure all content is visible to the reader. It is the second checkbox on this page.
intelligence-penalized-title: Inteligência Penalizada. Penalidades aos pontos de habilidade apenas mudam o modificador, não os pontos em si. A cada 2 pontos de dano ou penalidade a uma habilidade, aplique uma penalidade de –1 às perícias e estatísticas relacionadas.
is-mythic: Check if this row is Mythic
is-npc-description: Sheet is an NPC or Monster
iterative-attacks-title: Add additional attacks for this weapon.
kinetic-blast-attack-damage-macros: Kinetic Blast attack and damage macros
legs-title: How many legs the character has Affects carrying capacity Check if it should use quadruped carrying capacity
link-hit-points-npc-to-pc: Alterar @{NPC-hp} com a ficha aberta altera @{hp} e vice versa
link-hit-points-title: Sincroniza @{NPC-HP} a @{HP} se usar @{HP} para pontos de dano do pnj/monstro.
macro-recalc-instructions: If you are having problems with list or skill macros, uncheck the appropriate box below and hit the recalc button.
manual-recalc-for-high-cr: Check to manually hit recalc after parse is complete (Recommended for high CR creatures with many abilities)
max-hp-title: Automaticamente calculado usando pontos de dano da Classe, pontos de dano da Classe Favorecida (veja a aba de Classes), bônus/penalidade de Habilidade & Nível, PV Adj1, Mod2, condição Exaurido e pontos de dano de Aventuras Míticas (se acionado).
maximum-damage-ability-title: Maximum damage ability applied (for strength score, etc.)
maximum-dexterity-title: Maximum Dexterity to AC limited due to armor or encumberance.
melee-attack-notes: Notas de ataque corpo a corpo
melee-attack-notes-place: Put notes about context-sensitive Melee Attack bonuses here.
mental-modifiers-total: Total of all 3 mental ability modifiers
merge-buffs: Copy old buffs list into new buffs list
merge-class-features: Merge Orig Class Features into Abilities
merge-race-traits: Merge Orig Racial Traits into Abilities
merge-slas: Merge Orig Spell-like Abilities into Abilities
metamagic-title: Click to show spell slot field to differentiate slot from spell level
monster-or-non-player-character: A ficha representa um Monstro ou PdM
monster-or-pc-indicator: Indicador de Monstro ou Personagem do Jogador
morale-place: List here under what condition the creature flees combat, if any.
mythic-bonus-hit-points-title: Bonus hit points that are gained from each tier advancement: archmage: 3, champion: 5, guardian: 5, hierophant: 4, marshal: 4, or trickster: 4
mythic-hero-power: Mythic Hero Information and Mythic Power
mythic-hit-points-title: Bonus HP x Tier. This is automatically added to Max HP
mythic-path-title: Mythic Path: archmage, champion, guardian, hierophant, marshal, or trickster
mythic-power-avail-title: How much mythic power you have available to use
mythic-power-max-title: The maximum amount of mythic power you have
mythic-power-miscellaneous-title: Any additional mythic power you gain from abilities or feats
mythic-power-tiers-title: The amount of mythic power you gain from tiers
mythic-tier-title: Mythic tier or rank. Mythic tiers range from 1 to 10
name: Nome
nav-main-desc: Main menubar follows this element (it is not inside the menubar element). Menuitem 'all' displays all sections.
negative-number: Use um número negativo para indicar a penalidade
non-proficient-armor-title: Take the armor's (and/or shield's) armor check penalty on attack rolls as well as on all Dexterity- and Strength-based ability and skill checks
nonlethal-damage-title: Player adjustable tracking of non-lethal damage. Character is staggered if nonlethal damage >= current hp, field will outline in yellow.
npc-ac-compendium-place: Format: AC nn, touch nn, flat-footed nn (+n DEX, +n natural, +n size, +n dodge)
npc-senses-compendium-place: Format: blindsense 20 ft., low-light vision; Perception + 20
npc-special-attacks-place: Lista todas as ações especiais de combate aqui, em ordem alfabética. Não lista proezas.
npc-statblock-parse-instructions: Drag a monster from the compendium here, or type in the statblock values below. Then hit the parse button. The parser will populate the sheet with the underlying stats and attacks.
npc-statblock-textarea-instructions: For multiline textareas, paste in exactly as appears in source. Keep newlines in input.
number-extra-attacks-title: Number of offhand attacks: 1 for Two Weapon Fighting, 2 = Improved, 3 = Greater
number-fill-in-skills-show: Number of craft, perform, profession skills to show:
number-misc-skills-show: Number of Misc skills to show:
number-prepared-title: Indicates the number of prepared spells remaining.
number-used-title: Indicates the number of times a spell has been cast today.
offhand-damage-multiplier: Offhand strength(or whatever ability is used for damage of an offhand attack) damage multiplier. ie 1/2 default, 1 for Double Slice
options-attacks-accessible-title: Use simple accessible template for attacks.
options-attacks-include-link-abilities: When creating an Ability-based attack, include a link to the ability in the weapon notes.
options-attacks-include-link-spells: When creating a Spell-based attack, include a link to the spell in the weapon notes.
options-spell-accessible-title: Use simple accessible template for spells
options-use-metrics-title: Show auto-calculated totals for weight and distance as metric. This option DOES NOT convert user input for weight and distance. Ensure you have entered metric-based values.
other-currency-title: Total de Moedas que não estão sendo carregadas pelo personagem no momento
other-spells-per-day-title: If Spells/Day represents prepared spells, use this to set total Spontaneous Spells/Day. Or vice-versa
over-heavy-encumbrance-title: A character can lift as much as double his maximum load off the ground, but he or she can only stagger around with it.
overloaded-title: While overloaded in this way, the character loses any Dexterity bonus to AC and can move only 5 feet per round (as a full-round action).
player-character: A ficha representa um Personagem do Jogador
precision-damage-title: Extra or Precision Damage (not added to critical damage)
prepared-spells-explanation: On prepared casters, spells with a positive number in uses are considered 'prepared', uses represents the number of times memorized and usable that are left.
psionic-ability-title: The psionic class key ability modifier source.
psionic-manifester-level-and-power-point: Psionic Manifester Level and Power Points
psionic-manifester-lvls-title: The sum of the levels of psionic classes that have a key ability score selected on the right.
psionic-manifester-miscellaneous-title: Any miscellaneous modifiers to the manifester level.
psionic-power-points-available-title: How many power points you have available to use.
psionic-power-points-bonus-title: The amount of bonus power points you gain from manifester level and key ability modifier.
psionic-power-points-class-title: The amount of base bonus power points you gain from you class(es).
psionic-power-points-miscellaneous-title: Quaisquer pontos de poder ganhos por raça, peculiaridades ou proezas.
psionic-power-points-reserve-title: Sua reserva de pontos de poder é igual ao seus pontos de poder base ganhos por sua classe, pontos de poder bônus de uma habilidade elevada, e quaisquer pontos de poder bônus adicionais de fontes como sua raça e proezas.
range-per-level-desc: Number ( for 'Per Level' or 'Number'), or special range desc ('line' or 'cone')
ranged-attack-notes-place: Put notes about context-sensitive Ranged Attack bonuses here.
recalculate-hit-points: Recalculate HP and reset to max.
recalculate-hit-points-title: Recalculate HP and Temp HP and set current HP to max.
resistances-title: Ignores some damage of the indicated type each time it takes damage of that kind. (e.g. acid 10)
roll-time-custom-attributes: Evaluate at roll time custom attributes
roll-time-custom-num-attributes: Evaluate at roll time custom number attributes
row-id-desc: Row ID for macros under ID section of the row. Does not appear in compact Mode.
rule-category: Category of rule this falls under
sanity-save-custom-modifier: Custom Will save mod for save vs sanity effects
save-notes-place: Put notes about context-sensitive Saving Throw bonuses here.
scroll-desc-title: Scroll long descriptions in roll templates.
set-as-armor: Definir valores de armadura usando esta linha
set-as-shield: Set shield values using this row
set-sheet-color: Set sheet color to rolltemplate color
sheets-created-after-v1: Sheet created at version 100 or later
sheets-guide: KNOWN ISSUES / Wiki HOW TO Guide
show-all-conditions-desc: Show conditions that do not have a numeric effect on sheet stats.
show-arcane-reservoir-title: Show Arcane Reservoir in spell point field
show-in-menu-title: Click to display a button for this row in the appropriate command menu.
show-old-announcements: Check to reveal Old Announcements section
show-onetime-columns-title: Mostra proeza, raça, peculiaridade, e classe e requere colunas de treinamento.
show-onetime-item-fields-title: Show item equipment type, hardness, item-hp, item-hp|max, and value.
show-phrenic-spellpoint-pool: Show Spell Points for Phrenic Pool or Mesmerist Tricks
show-phrenic-spellpoint-pool-title: Show Phrenic Pool or Mesmerist Tricks in spell point field
show-skills: Expand to show more custom skills
show-spellpoint-arcane-reservoir: Show Spell Points for Arcane Reservoir
show-uses-spell-desc: Show # spells used per day in spells menu
skill-notes-place: Put notes about context-sensitive Skill bonuses here.
skill-size-title: Size adjustment for skills. Double for stealth
skills-per-hit-die: Skill Ranks per hit die due to race
source-ability-title: ID da habilidade da lista de Habilidades que, quando mudada, atualiza este registro de ataque
source-attack-title: ID of the attack from the Attacks list that, when changed, updates this attack entry
source-item-title: ID do Item da aba de Inventário que, quando mudado, atualiza este registro de ataque
source-spell-title: ID da Magia da aba de Magias que, quando mudado, atualiza este registro de ataque
source-title: Source of ability - class or race
special-abilities-and-content-place: Format: Special Abilities (newline) Ability Name (Ex): ability description (newline) description of monster
special-qualities-place: Add all special qualities here, listed alphabetically
speed-multiplier-title: Run Multiplier; (×4) if light, medium, or no armor. (×3) if heavy armor.
speed-run-title: A distância máxima que o personagem pode correr em linha reta durante um turno
speed-title: The modified speed due to armor and/or carry capacity & load
spell-penetration-bonus-label: Bonus to caster level check for Spell Penetration
spell-resistance-title: Spell Resistance: Avoids the effects of spells and spell-like abilities that directly affect it. Caster Level check vs SR to negate resistance.
spellbook-only-prepared-spells: Show only prepared spells in spellbook
spellclass-level-base: Spellclass level, concentration, and base stats
spells-migrated-title: Spells migrated If you have not deleted original spells you can remigrate To remigrate, WARNING: DELETE ALL spells on spells tab and uncheck, then press refresh
statistics-rolls-title: Defense stats and other future stat blocks
strength-penalized-title: Força Penalizada. Penalidades aos pontos de habilidade apenas mudam o modificador, não os pontos em si. A cada 2 pontos de dano ou penalidade a uma habilidade, aplique uma penalidade de –1 às perícias e estatísticas relacionadas.
sum-uses-from-spells: Sum of 'Uses' fields in spell rows
temporary-hit-points-buff-title: Pontos de vida temporários que vêm de Buffs ativos (veja aba Central).
temporary-hit-points-maximum-title: Pontos de vida temporários máximo caso usado como reserva secundária.
temporary-hit-points-miscellaneous-title: Pontos de vida temporários configuráveis pelo jogador, adicionados ao valor total de PV Temporário
title: Título/Apelido
toggle-buff: Quando marcado, esta melhora é ativada e contará pelos totais, o que afetará o resto da ficha. Além disso, apenas as melhoras visíveis/selecionadas contarão pelos totais.
toggle-horror-adventures-long: Display/Enable Horror Adventures Character Sheet Items
toggle-mythic-adventures: Display/Enable Mythic Adventures Character Sheet Items
uncanny-dodge-desc: Do not lose DEX when Flat-Footed
uncanny-dodge-title: If checked, AC will not auto adjust when a condition is checked that causes loss of DEX to AC, except for immobilizing conditions.
undead-title: Creature is undead, uses Charisma for hit points, abilities, skills instead of Constitution
unlock-defense-dropdowns: Allow AC and CMD to use different ability scores
unlock-defense-dropdowns-title: If checked, CMD could use different ability in 2nd dropdown than AC uses. For instance, DEX for AC and INT for CMD, instead of DEX or WIS for both.
update-hp-when-max-changes: Update curr HP when max HP changes
update-hp-when-max-changes-title: When max hp changes, updates current hit points by same amount
update-to-latest: Atualizar todas as fichas para a última versão
update-weapons: Update dual wield attacks with new penalties or improved state
use-buff-bonus-stacking: Use buff bonus types and stacking
use-dwarf-encumbrance-title: Use Dwarf encumbrance rules: base speed not lowered due to load or armor encumbrance
use-round-corners-on-simple-templates: Round Corners on non simple template.
use-simple-templates: Use Simple Templates (Spells and Attacks set seperately)
vision-title: Low-light vision('...see twice as far as normal in dim light.'), Darkvision('...see with no light source at all'), etc.
weaknesses-title: Adverse conditions may apply if applicable. (e.g. sunlight powerlessness/staggered)
whisper-character-rolls: Rolagem PJ: Sussurrar ao Mestre ou compartilhar publicamente
whisper-non-player-character-rolls: Rolagem PNJ: Sussurrar ao Mestre ou compartilhar publicamente
whisper-rolls-title: Sussurrar ao Mestre ou transmitir publicamente
wisdom-penalized-title: Sabedoria Penalizada. Penalidades aos pontos de habilidade apenas mudam o modificador, não os pontos em si. A cada 2 pontos de dano ou penalidade a uma habilidade, aplique uma penalidade de –1 às perícias e estatísticas relacionadas.
worn-equipment-hardness-title: The hardness of the item that helps prevent it from taking hit point damage
worn-equipment-hp-max-title: Pontos de Vida máximo do item
worn-equipment-hp-title: Pontos de Vida atual do item
worn-equipment-quantity-title: If the item has charges, this is how many remain
worn-equipment-slot-title: The location on the body where the equipment is worn
worn-equipment-value-title: O valor do item medido em peças de ouro
wounded-title: -2 de penalidade em todas as rolagens de ataque, testes de resistência, testes de perícia, e testes de habilidade, assim como à CA e ao nível de conjurador
